caption.p: SEM images of microcapsules using 6000Ã— magnifications with measured diameters: GUM (gum arabic), SKIM (skim milk), BCYC (beta-cyclodextrin), MD (maltodextrin), SCAS (sodium caseinate), RMD (resistant-maltodextrin). Images were prepared using microparticles which were spray-dried using 20% of wall materials.
